items.title: MindTools: The CLEAR Model for Feedback
items.summary: A concise explanation of the CLEAR feedback model (Context, Listen, Example, Action, Review) with practical tips.

items.title: Brené Brown on Clear is Kind (Video)
items.summary: Short video clip where Brené Brown discusses the importance of directness and clarity in communication and feedback.

items.title: Radical Candor: Getting Specific with Feedback
items.summary: Article emphasizing the 'Example' part of feedback, aligning with Radical Candor's principles of specific behavioral examples.

items.title: CLEAR Feedback Preparation Template
items.summary: A simple downloadable template to structure your thoughts before delivering feedback using the CLEAR model.

items.title: Center for Creative Leadership: 3 Key Active Listening Skills
items.summary: Focuses on paraphrasing, inquiring, and acknowledging feelings as core components of active listening.

items.title: Carl Rogers on Empathic Listening (Video)
items.summary: Classic footage explaining the power of deep, empathic listening from a foundational psychologist.

items.title: Active Listening Self-Checklist
items.summary: A tool to assess your listening habits in recent conversations (e.g., Did I interrupt? Did I paraphrase?).

items.title: Podcast: The Importance of Listening in Leadership
items.summary: Podcast episode featuring leadership experts discussing how active listening builds trust and improves decision-making.

items.title: HBR Guide to Delegating Effectively
items.summary: Covers the principles of delegation, including choosing the right task, person, and level of authority.

items.title: Delegation Decision Matrix Tool
items.summary: A simple matrix to help decide which tasks are suitable for delegation based on importance and urgency.

items.title: Video: 5 Common Delegation Mistakes to Avoid
items.summary: Short video highlighting frequent errors like unclear instructions, lack of follow-up, and reverse delegation.

items.title: Book Excerpt: 'The E-Myth Revisited' on Systemization
items.summary: Relevant sections discussing how building systems enables effective delegation beyond just assigning tasks.

items.title: MindTools: The GROW Model of Coaching
items.summary: Detailed explanation of the GROW model (Goal, Reality, Options, Will) with example questions for each stage.

items.title: Sir John Whitmore Explains the GROW Model (Video)
items.summary: Video featuring the originator of the GROW model discussing its application in performance coaching.

items.title: GROW Model Question Bank
items.summary: A list of powerful coaching questions categorized by each stage of the GROW model.

items.title: Building a Coaching Culture with GROW
items.summary: Article discussing how managers can use the GROW model in daily interactions, not just formal sessions.

items.title: Harvard PON: 5 Conflict Resolution Strategies
items.summary: Overview from the Program on Negotiation covering avoiding, accommodating, compromising, competing, and collaborating.

items.title: Book Excerpt: 'Crucial Conversations' - Mastering Dialogue
items.summary: Key principles for handling high-stakes disagreements, focusing on safety and mutual purpose.

items.title: Understanding the Thomas-Kilmann Conflict Modes (Video)
items.summary: Explainer video detailing the TKI model's five approaches to conflict based on assertiveness and cooperativeness.

items.title: Conflict Styles Assessment (Simple)
items.summary: A brief online quiz to help identify your dominant conflict resolution style.

items.title: HBR: What Is Strategy, Again?
items.summary: Classic article clarifying the definition of strategy and distinguishing it from operational effectiveness.

items.title: SWOT Analysis Template & Guide
items.summary: Tool and guide for conducting a Strengths, Weaknesses, Opportunities, Threats analysis.

items.title: Michael Porter on Competitive Strategy (Video)
items.summary: Interviews or lectures explaining Porter's Five Forces and generic strategies (cost leadership, differentiation, focus).

items.title: Book Excerpt: 'Good Strategy Bad Strategy'
items.summary: Key sections outlining the 'kernel' of good strategy: diagnosis, guiding policy, and coherent actions.

items.title: Carol Dweck: The Power of Believing You Can Improve (TED Talk)
items.summary: The foundational TED Talk explaining the difference between fixed and growth mindsets.

items.title: HBR: How Companies Can Profit from a Growth Mindset
items.summary: Article discussing the organizational benefits and practices for fostering a growth mindset culture.

items.title: Growth Mindset Praise Cheat Sheet
items.summary: Examples of how to rephrase fixed mindset praise ('You're smart') into growth mindset praise ('You worked hard').

items.title: The Neuroscience of Growth Mindset
items.summary: Explores the brain science behind learning, neuroplasticity, and how effort changes the brain.

items.title: Book Excerpt: 'The Oz Principle' - Above/Below the Line
items.summary: Key concepts on taking ownership ('Above the Line' behavior) vs. blame/victim mentality ('Below the Line').

items.title: Lencioni: The Trouble with Teamwork (Accountability)
items.summary: Discusses accountability as a key dysfunction of teams and the need for peer-to-peer accountability.

items.title: The Ladder of Accountability Tool
items.summary: Visual model and questions to help individuals and teams move up from blame towards ownership and solutions.

items.title: Holding People Accountable Without Being a Jerk (Video)
items.summary: Practical tips on structuring accountability conversations that are firm but fair.

items.title: Book Excerpt: 'Start With Why' - The Golden Circle
items.summary: Explains how communicating the 'Why' (purpose/vision) inspires action more effectively than 'What' or 'How'.

items.title: Jim Collins: Building Your Company's Vision (HBR)
items.summary: Classic HBR article on defining core ideology (values & purpose) and envisioned future (BHAGs & vivid description).

items.title: The Role of Storytelling in Vision Casting (Video)
items.summary: Explores how narrative and storytelling techniques make a vision more compelling and memorable.

items.title: Simple Vision Statement Template
items.summary: A guided template to help draft a concise and inspiring vision statement.
